title: enadu manam
sahitya:
enadu manam kavalai enumiruL shUzhndAl evariDam muraiyiDuvEn en sheivEn


anupallavi

  unadu malaraDiyil vizhuvEn tozhuvEn urugi ammA enrazhuvEn anri


caraNam    ulaguyirelAm Inra jaganmAtA un uLLam enakku maTTum irangAdA kaliyin
 koDumai kaNDun karuNai anjinadO karuNAnidhi enrunaip pugazhvadum pazhudO
